titleStmt.title: The proceedings against Sir Thomas Armstrong in His Majesties Court of King's Bench, at Westminster, upon an outlawry for high-treason, &c. : as also an account of what passed at his execution at Tyburn, the 20th. of June 1684 : together with the paper he delivered ...
titleStmt.author: Armstrong, Thomas, Sir, 1624?-1684.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Horn, John Baker, and John Redmayne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
